member.name: T:AudioAnalyzing.Audio
member.summary: Basic class for analyzing an audio file. Stores samples and does cluster analysis.

member.name: P:AudioAnalyzing.Audio.ActionTimes
member.summary: The times at which the music hits a peak. Useful for generating points were the player must hit a key to the beat

member.name: P:AudioAnalyzing.Audio.AudioLengthInMs
member.summary: The song's total duration in milliseconds

member.name: M:AudioAnalyzing.Audio.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Takes in a file path and starts analysis right away. Stores the results of that analysis
member.param: Full absolute path to the .wav file

member.name: M:AudioAnalyzing.Audio.DebugFileWrite
member.summary: Only used for debugging cluster analysis. Use these files in the Octave "reload.m" script which is in the "Audio Analysis via Octave" folder

member.name: M:AudioAnalyzing.Audio.GetPosition
member.summary: Gets the index of the current sample being played
member.returns: Index/Position of the sample being played

member.name: M:AudioAnalyzing.Audio.GetNumberOfSamples
member.summary: Retrieves the total number of samples for this song
